alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:13AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Red Lake, northern Norman, southwestern Polk, northwestern Mahnomen and northeastern Traill Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harold, or 30 miles southeast of Grand Forks, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fertile, Halstad, Climax, Winger, Shelly, Mentor and Maple Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
